content: That looks like a good starting point. I like the idea of allocating my most important tasks to Mondays and Tuesdays. I do have a few recurring meetings on Thursdays, so I'll make sure to schedule those in. Also, I wanted to ask, do you have any recommendations for apps or tools that can help me stay organized and on track with my schedule? I've been using a physical planner, but I'm open to exploring digital options as well.
